website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy and precise baby and toddler scale that's perfect for tracking your child's growth.
pros: Reading in pounds and ounces for precise measurement
Sturdy scale that holds up well over time
cons: Older babies and toddlers will outgrow the height measurement tool

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Can you say peace of mind! Used this with my latest kiddo for breastfeeding weights. I have had 2 kiddos who have had issues nursing and this was great to give me a quick clue on how much they were getting in a feeding without having to go in to my lactation consultant. Weight to age guides are great as well to let us know we are keeping on track between pediatrician visits.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because im nervous about my baby weight. Its pretty accurate i weight her right before one of her doctors appointment and when we went in they gave us close to the same reading i had on this. I love how easy it is to measure the length, its always get excited to see how much she grew in that week.
customer_reviews.author: coolgurl

customer_reviews.title: Nice little scale but readings are not very stable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this scale to be able to track how much milk my daughter is getting when breast feeding. For the price point, it has the best resolution I could find (5g/0.1oz). It’s really easy to use and stores several of the last weights taken, which is nice. The only downside is that it fluctuates A LOT with a wiggly baby and does not have an averaging feature. But if you are patient, you can get a pretty accurate reading. Overall good value.
customer_reviews.author: LT7

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful idea behind the layout, but not accurate
customer_reviews.text: This scale is very touchy. I very much like the idea behind it and if it was more accurate it would be wonderful. But if your child moves at all, the scale is not accurate. Any small movement will throw it off. It can be very difficult to weight my child. It basically gives me an approximation but is never exact. I have used this and then taken my child to the doctor the same day and the measurements always differ. It’s not usually a large difference but enough when I’m trying to keep adequate measurements. I wouldn’t recommend if you are looking for accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Reyna Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: If you need a baby scale, this is the one!
customer_reviews.text: We ended up purchasing this product due to the fact we couldn’t make our infants pediatric appointments because of covid. We vide chat conference called with our doctor and used this scale and built in measuring device to report her weight and height to the doctor. This scale also includes a soft measuring tape to measure babies head circumference. This product work great and now it’s handy to do monthly weight ins and length checks with our little one. Very sturdy, easy to use product.
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This weight scale is useless because you need to stay still in order to get the digital screen to stop and show accurate weight. This was supposed to be baby and toddler, what kinds of infant and toddler stay still when they weight, at least they move your hands and legs around. This is totally not for kids. I'm returning back.
customer_reviews.author: thawshun

customer_reviews.title: Extremely accurate
customer_reviews.text: Nice packaging, easy assemble (just pop in the provided batteries) and accurate to the ounce. This scale is a lifesaver! I don’t have to keep going back to the doctors office now and wait an hour to be seen with all the illness going around. Great peace of mind for new Mommies.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea C.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little off by an ounce or two and the only way to get a more accurate reading is to zero it out with baby on it then taking baby off and reading the negative number. It’s still really good to have to keep track of how much baby is gaining, just might not be as accurate as the drs scale, the features are really cool though with the height and the chart book it came with!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This scale is easy to use straight out of the box but I ended up returning it because I wasn’t able to get an accurate reading. My baby was just a few weeks old and when his arms and legs would move the number would jump up and down to the point that I had no idea what the reading was. And then after a minute the scale just shuts off. I wouldn’t recommend it unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Monique B.

customer_reviews.title: Ready To Go Out of The Box
customer_reviews.text: This scale was a quick set-up, just install the included batteries and use. Simple push of one button to tare the weight of a diaper and a shirt that my daughter was wearing at the time of weighing, so I could get an accurate weight. This is helpful to have in my home to keep track of my very small 2 year old. We are under the care of doctors, but it makes me feel better keeping track of her weight progress in between visits. Also, it comes with a log book, so I can bring that with me to share her progress with her doctor as well. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: R. E.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love having this to keep track of babies weight inbetween appointments. Easy to set up and use. Seems to be accurate so far. Enjoy the feature to measure height as well though if he kicks or even nudges it gently with his foot it it drops down and makes it difficult to get an accurate height measurement. Overall would recommend and is a great price compared to similar baby scales!
customer_reviews.author: Roch_Sue

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my cat as I needed to start weighing him nightly. He gets right on with no issues and the scale is very accurate. He fits on it with no issues and actually likes sitting or laying on it.
customer_reviews.author: Katz Blue

customer_reviews.title: Just received this scale.
customer_reviews.text: We are using this in our pediatric office. What a time saver. Once we tried it and determined its accuracy, we are ordering more to have one in each exam room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but thats about it
customer_reviews.text: It is impossible to use it since it will not measure it unless my 11 month old son keeps it still which is again pretty impossible. I like the idea of the length measure as well but the longest it gets is 31.7" and again my son is over 32". Im going to need to return it and purchase a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ozgur Ekinci

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for peace of mind while breastfeeding
customer_reviews.text: Purchased because my baby was losing weight while breastfeeding. The hardest part is trying to keep my little boy from wiggle long enough to get a reading
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Not for those that need to do weighted feedings
customer_reviews.text: Our have a newborn that is having a hard time gaining weight. Will not be accurate as you have to press the hold button as baby is wiggling around and it will land wherever it is when you press the button, which can be a variation of .1 to .4 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: I just wanted this to work so bad especially worrying about a little ones weight
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product a negative star I would. I was so excited and NEEDED this scale to function properly and it just didn't work. I read the manual time and time again and it just kept saying my baby weighed 8lbs 5oz no matter what setting I changed it to it always weighed somewhat half of his actual weight. He weighs 16.8 on every other scale I own. I just wanted this to work so bad especially worrying about a little ones weight. Won't ever buy another product from OZERI ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Working
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first couple times, now it says my baby only weighs 5 lbs, and she’s a very healthy almost 13 lb baby girl. I have changed the units, reset it, I can’t figure out how to fix it or why it’s not working.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Nice item works well
customer_reviews.text: I like to know how much my newborn weighs pretty often so couldn’t wait to go to the drs each time . This helped me out . I don’t know what use it’ll have after but we will see :)
customer_reviews.author: Summer L

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love having this for in between ped visits! Love tracking my babies growth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that I can’t figure out how to save baby’s weight & height. Haven’t read the manual though LOL. I suggest snapping your fingers to get baby to stay still !
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: My newborn is slow at gaining weight so bought this to track his growth so far seems pretty accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Alannah Bartell

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great help for me with breastfeeding my daughter. The scale always matches what they measure at the pediatrician's office
customer_reviews.author: Charity Paprocki

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all
customer_reviews.text: From the time we opened this item, it didn't work. We tried new batteries and everything but we could not get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Samirah

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the nursery!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our nursery. I love being able to track my daughter’s weight and length at home! This scale is very light weight & easy to use! The chart it comes with is nice. Everyone should have one of their own!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFox

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: When you have a preemie who is a slow gainer it’s great to have an easy to use and accurate scale at home. We love the growth portion as well.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Baby Scales
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the baby scales for my daughter to use for her baby. In addition to being able to weigh him, she can also measure his length. She has only had them a week or so, but so far she really likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect scale for baby
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tool for baby. If you are anxious about your baby’s weight and height, or just curious about how your baby grows, definitely buy it!
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: Great baby scale for the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and great to monitor baby's weight between checkups.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Dunnaway

customer_reviews.title: Not very accurate
customer_reviews.text: I love this scale but it doesn’t seem to be accurate I weighed my son at home and then at his doctors appointment and the Ozeri scale was off by 6 pounds
customer_reviews.author: Earliyah Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great when baby is calm!
customer_reviews.text: Very susceptible to baby movements when on the scale. Gotta try to get baby to be very still, but once calmed down, great accurate scale.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff K

customer_reviews.title: Baby scale
customer_reviews.text: Okay scale, nothing particularly great or wrong. The height function is a bit harder to figure out
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tracking growth
customer_reviews.text: This scale gives a reading in pounds and ounces, which makes it easy to track your baby's growth.
customer_reviews.author: PGusmano

customer_reviews.title: Very bad product,stopped working within 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to weigh my baby.the weight scale stopped working within 6 months
customer_reviews.author: Smritti Agrawal

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: It works well in one year, then it couldn't work
customer_reviews.author: Jing Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is an excellent scale, easy to use and to cleanse
customer_reviews.author: Norma J. Arciniegas-Medina

customer_reviews.title: Pretty useless, and missed return window
customer_reviews.text: Pretty useless, and missed return window, as ut cant work as baby wont stay still and reading takes a long time.
customer_reviews.author: rosweet

customer_reviews.title: I really love the product
customer_reviews.text: I really love the product, it came in the estimated time and just as described. I truly recommend this seller and the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item didn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this item to work! But it gave inaccurate weight measurements
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it will do
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this scale to measure our newborn and how much breastmilk she is getting. It does measure in tenths of an ounce as it stated in description. It is easy to use. You can put a soft blanket on top and then hit power button so it won't count the blanket when measuring. Only reason I did not give it a 4 or 5 is literally the baby needs to not move not one bit to get a measurement. My baby moves so I cannot get an accurate reading.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Useful for Babies
customer_reviews.text: This comes with a booklet to chart baby's growth patterns which is really neat. They got them from the CDC's website so it's what the pediatrician uses. The scale is neat and the measuring tape is useful. I can track baby's growth. This is so much easier to use than a regular scale. I'd give this as a present for a baby shower and I wish I had this with my older kids. I love that it comes with batteries. It took a little time to figure out, but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Zebragirl

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GIFT FOR NEW PARENTS
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit at the baby shower for the upcoming parents to be. It is lightweight and very easy to use. I tested it with 1 of my husbands 10 pound weights and was quite surprised at how accurate it was. It does height as well as weight and baby head circumference. It has a built in memory to record up to 8 babies. It is very nice to know how the baby is progressing without having to wait for baby check ups.
customer_reviews.author: timeforachange

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not perfect.  But it is a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I like this however it says it has the feature where after a bit it locks onto a weight but haven't had it do it ever. Yes, I think I it is giving an accurate weight however with a hungry baby it is hard to get. I want able to get the height part to give an accurate number.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: I really like this baby scale! I weighed my 6 month old son on it right before his doctor’s appointment, and he was 19lb 7.8oz. He was 19lb 6oz on the doctor’s scale, but he also had a massive poop blowout in the car on the way to the appointment. Lol. So I consider this scale very accurate. I have not used it to measure his length yet, but it seems very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie G

customer_reviews.title: The scale works great
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the scale does what it says. It allows you take the weight of a baby in lbs and oz and which is nice. It has a memory feature which is helpful for tracking growth. I also appreciate that it came with batteries. A plug in option would be nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus

customer_reviews.title: Pretty accurate
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t get this 5 stars because I’m not sure it’s accurate as it claims to be. But it’s decently accurate. We had difficulties with breastfeeding and this helped us understand how much we were feeding her and if she was gaining weight or not.
customer_reviews.author: Celestia H

customer_reviews.title: Too bad!
customer_reviews.text: Too disappointed! It just didn't work! My baby is only 0.66lb??!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: With an IUGR (intrauterine growth restriction) baby, I wanted to know his weight more often than just his doctors appointments. Being able to measure his height is great as well!
customer_reviews.author: Molly B.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It weighs your baby, measures length and gives you a tape to measure head circumference. The price was worth it because it saved me from a few trips to the pediatrician. It also set my mind at ease by letting me know my newborn was gaining weight ok whenever I wanted to check.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and sleek design
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I don’t have to wait until the children are sick to get their exact height or weight. This design is so easy to use and it’s right on the money for accuracy. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Deselle

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after three months.
customer_reviews.text: It looks all fancy *but* it stopped working after three months. That’s right. It wouldn’t turn on at all. I changed the batteries and that did not help. I will also mention that i used the scale roughly once a month so at this price, it’s about $10+ per weighing session for me.
customer_reviews.author: ValleyStream

customer_reviews.title: Good scale
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and baby only mildly loses it when we put her on it. We've enjoyed using this to track her monthly weight gain.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I used it less than a year for my older son. It’s very difficult to switch between lb and kg. I have to turn it on and off and press the button very hard. Sometime it won’t do it. My second son was born 15 months later. We changed the battery and used it several times then it died on us. Quality is not reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Accurate and good quality. Got it to make sure baby was growing. It gave us peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: michelled

customer_reviews.title: Keeps track of my sons weight great but he is way too tall for it.
customer_reviews.text: its nice but still a little disappointing. I wanted to use it to also keep track of my son height but he is too tall for it already.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to weigh my baby at home! This scale is accurate and does just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Good scale for price
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot. I wish my baby would stay still or asleep so I could actually use it though haha
customer_reviews.author: jennay

customer_reviews.title: Sure!
customer_reviews.text: The height part doesn’t seem to work for me, but the weight works well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Abi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Light weight to carry, help me get my baby weight, height and head circumference all at home.
customer_reviews.author: mary Kiriakos

product_meta.title: Ozeri All-in-One Baby and Toddler Scale - with Weight and Height Change Detection
product_meta.description: The Ozeri All-In-One Baby and Toddler Scale combines weight and height measurement technology, built-in memory, age and gender specific growth charts, and a bonus head circumference measuring tape to provide everything needed to confidently monitor a child's growth. The Ozeri All-In-One Scale precisely weighs to within 0.1 oz (0.01 lbs or 0.005 kg), with a maximum weight capacity of 55 lbs / 25 kg, for best-in-class accuracy, and features built-in memory for up to 8 unique infant profiles with auto-recognition technology. It also stores up to 15 weigh-ins for each infant profile so that you can monitor and track growth data in between doctor's visits. The Ozeri All-In-One Scale also utilizes a sliding measurement board that digitally captures an infant's height, from 18.1 to 31.5 inches (in), or 46 to 80 centimeters (cm), with a precise graduation of 0.1 in / or 1 mm (0.1 cm). Featuring net change detection, the Ozeri All-In-One Scale instantly displays an infant’s current weight and height, and the net change in weight and height since the most recent measurement. The Ozeri All-In-One Scale includes a Unit button that conveniently switches weight and height measurements between kg-cm / lb-in / oz-in / lb:oz-in, and a Tare button that instantly subtracts the weight of diapers or clothing, for accurate net weight determination. The Ozeri scale is also equipped with a convenient Hold button that quickly captures weight and height measurements with a moving infant. Fully equipped, the Ozeri All-In-One Baby and Toddler Scale includes 4 AAA batteries, an accessory measuring tape for measuring head circumference, and easy-to-read growth charts from both the World Health Organization and the CDC, with age and gender specific charts.
feature_bullets: All-in-one scale digitally measures weight and height with net change detection between weigh-ins, and includes a bonus head circumference measuring tape.
Precisely weighs to within 0.1 oz (0.01 lbs or 0.005 kg), with a maximum weight capacity of 55 lbs / 25 kg, for best-in-class accuracy.
Equipped with built-in memory for up to 8 infants or toddlers, with a convenient Hold button that quickly captures weight and height measurements with a moving infant.
Features a Unit button that conveniently switches weight and height measurements between kg-cm / lb-in / oz-in / lb:oz-in.
Also features a handy Tare button that instantly subtracts the weight of diapers or clothing for accurate net weight determination.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
